body.name: Taidacent 2510-4P 3P Manual 4 Wires 0-5V 12V Fan Speed Controller PWM Speed Control On Off Switch for PC CPU Case Fan with Knob (White Connector with Plastic Black Knob)

asinVariationValues.variationValue: Solder connector with Plastic black Knob
White connector with Plastic Black Knob

deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Saturday, February 17 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35

features: This is a PWM fan speed controller. It can only control 12V four-wire fans that support PWM speed regulation. For example, many 12V four-wire chassis or CPU fans cannot control 2-3-wire fans.

If the speed of the fan changes and the direction of adjustment is opposite, it means that the fan is a reverse-sequence fan, and the (PF) setting point needs to be short-circuited with solder, and the power must be turned off before operation to avoid damage! The short-circuited PWM signal changes in the reverse direction with the adjustment, and the reverse-sequence fan can realize forward adjustment.

Pay attention to the positive and negative poles and the power supply voltage. After the power supply fan is connected, it can be used. The potentiometer is turned off counterclockwise to the end, and the clockwise end is the maximum output. A separate small adjustable resistor (starting speed adjustment) on the board is used to adjust the speed of the just-open position.

Fan current 3A this current is limited by switches and connectors.For fans over 3A, connect a large current fan method: the positive and negative poles of the power supply of the fan can be connected to the power supply, the positive and negative poles of the fan are connected to the power supply separately, and the negative pole of the fan is connected to the negative pole of the board; speed measurement and control are connected to the board .

Consumption less than 20mA without fan PWM signal model 0-5V 25Khz PWM signal output range 0% to 100% Start of PWM adjust range 0% to 60% Output interface 2510-4P, 2.54mm space Size 26*20mm, knob screw extension 15mm installation opening 7mm

For fans ,over 3A, connect a large current fan method: the positive and negative poles of the power supply of the fan can be connected to the power supply, the positive and negative poles of the fan are connected to the power supply separately, and the negative poleof the fan is connected to the negative pole of the board; speed measurement and control are connected to the board .Consumption:less than 20mA without fanPWM signal model:0-5V 25KhzPWM signal output range:0% to 100%Start of PWM adjust range:0% to 60%Output interface:2510-4P, 2.54mm spaceSize:26*20mm, knob screw extension 15mm installation opening 7mm

Interfaces Functions and Remarks: Pay attention to the positive and negative poles and the power supply voltage. After the power supply fan is connected, it can be used. The potentiometer is turned off counterclockwise to the end, and the clockwise end is the maximum output. A separate small adjustable resistor (starting speed adjustment) on the board is used to adjust the speed of the just-open position. If the speed of the fan changes and the direction of adjustment is opposite, it means that the fan is a reverse-sequence fan, and the (PF) setting point needs to be short-circuited with solder, and the power must be turned off before operation to avoid damage! The short-circuited PWM signal changes in the reverse direction with the adjustment, and the reverse-sequence fan can realize forward adjustment.This is a four-wire PWM fan speed controller. It can only control 12V four-wire fans that support PWM speed regulation. For example, many 12V four-wire chassis or CPU fans cannot control 2-3-wire fans.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Work as intended
reviews.reviewText: No frills module to control PWM fan. Two ways to adjust with 2 separate pots to fine tune fan speed that is required.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Worked very well for a small project i had using pc fans. No problems with the knob adjustment or Connection.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Exactly what I needed!
reviews.reviewText: I bought a pair of these Taidacent 2510-4P fan speed controllers to build my own cooling system for an older ISO Rack that houses my studio PCs. The old system was clunky, noisy and ran 24-7. So I bought two of these to control a pair Noctua 120mm fans in conjunction with a thermostat controller. This allowed me to set the fan speed on each fan to control the airflow and moreover the noise. These worked perfectly and now the enclosure is quieter, cooler and only runs when the temperature exceeds the threshold set on the thermostat. These fan speed controllers are high quality, well packaged and very straight forward to install. Thank you for this excellent product that made my custom build possible!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works Just as Expected
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. Connects right to any 3 or 4 pin fan connector, and fans/hubs with a 4-pin PWM header connect to the device. Connected it to a 6-fan hub and worked flawlessly right away.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works good even moist resistant
reviews.reviewText: Nice product has a main adjustment and an on board fine adjustment
